/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic -O3 -fPIC -ggdb -std=c++11 -Wall -Wno-deprecated -Werror -Wno-unused-function -Wno-builtin-macro-redefined -Wno-deprecated-declarations   CMakeFiles/test_thread.dir/tests/test_thread.cc.o  -o ../bin/test_thread  -L/home/xu/Server_SYLAR/sylar/lib -rdynamic ../lib/libsylar.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/xu/Server_SYLAR/sylar/lib
